document_data.name: Thunder
document_data.mainbody: Gauntlet '''Thunder''' was a member of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company and the Fist Drillmaster from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Thunder was a [[gold dwarvish]] woman with a light skin tone, brown eyes, short black hair, and a clean-shaven face. She wore a set of [[scale armor]] and a tabard adorned with the Flaming Fist insignia. She was armed with a [[warhammer]] and carried a large metal [[shield]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Gauntlet Thunder was stationed in the [[Basilisk Gate]]'s barracks and prison, serving under Blaze [[Liara Portyr]] and [[Manip Seyama]]. She spent her time as a stern-fisted drill sergeant for the Fists of the garrison.
